title: About Us
text: Custom Wars Tactics is developed by ctomni231 and BlackCat
The game itself is free to use. You also allowed to build own clients on top of the CW:T engine as long you not violate its license. Further information are available in the file LICENSE.
DISCLAMER: This game engine is in no way affiliated with Nintendo or Intelligent Systems, but acts as an experiment to show the working capabilities of HTML 5, Java, and JavaScript.

title: Legals
text: jQuery v1.7.1(MIT) is heavily used for our web page.
jQuery-UI v1.7.1(MIT) is heavily used for our web page.
Clear Sans (Apache License, Version 2.0) is heavily used on our web page.
MomentJs 2.0.0 (MIT) is used to format dates into a human read able format for our web page.
Javascript-Astar (MIT) is used to generate paths for unit movements.

title: Development Links
text: Custom Wars: Tactics is currently in development. If you want to grab information about the current state of the engine then you may visit some of the locations listed below.

• Github Repository
  • Google Repository (outdated)
  • Ohloh Analytics
  • Mailing-list
  • Slack
  • Game Bug? Report it here!!!

title: Community Forum Links
text: Contains the various locations where anyone can publicly can talk to the development team. Feel free to browse the old Custom Wars Forum while you're here.

• Advance Wars By Web
  • Wars World News
  • Reddit!
  • Custom Wars Forum (Archive)
